item.title: Let's Encrypt wildcard certificates
item.description: Install certbot Certbot is the official command line tool to manage Let's Encrypt certificates. Since certbot is a python application, it is best to install it via python packet manager: pip. # pip install certbot In order to issue wildcard certificates you need to use DNS authentication method. Certbot has many DNS providers covered, you can list them with: certbot plugins I will continue using OVH as DNS provider. # pip install certbot-dns-ovh Create an account Before being able to issue certificates, you need to create an account, certbot has you covered.
